TopicTitle: Which flag is better? - give your vote!

Articles.Content:
KSP Bro AE (who just wrote this) and KSP Bro KS made flags:

Atlysian EmpireKerbal Separatists

Please vote for the best!

Please post why you chose it.

NOTE: NEW & REVISED AE FLAG!

Edited March 14, 2016 by KSP Bros

You bros should check out this video about flag design for helpful guidelines and good and bad examples. You should be proud that both of yours are already way better than Milwaukee's. 

Before I choose, should we know anything about the symbolism in these flags? What do they mean to the members of these factions?

26 minutes ago, KSP Bros said:

KSP Bro AE (who just wrote this) and KSP Bro KS made flags:

Atlysian EmpireKerbal Separatists

Please vote for the best!

Please post why you chose it.

This is AE, my flag has the circle in the hexagon, which is based on the First Order flag. The green color is obvious. The lightning bolts represent the power, and the planets on the sides represent our dominance of space. (its true, I have WAAAAY better space assets than him. I have been to 10 clesential bodies, he has been to 2 [kerbin &kerbol].)

I don't know anything about his except red: bloodshed; green: kerbals.

2 hours ago, HebaruSan said:

You bros should check out this video about flag design for helpful guidelines and good and bad examples. You should be proud that both of yours are already way better than Milwaukee's. 

Before I choose, should we know anything about the symbolism in these flags? What do they mean to the members of these factions?

 

I watched it. Very interesting A kerbal is simple to draw and kerbin & duna are too.

I gotta vote for KS based on the video... the AE flag is too busy and the colors are too similar. Also, if you're going to have overlaying imagery (circle, bolts, and hexagon) they should all be different colors.

45 minutes ago, SpacedInvader said:

I gotta vote for KS based on the video... the AE flag is too busy and the colors are too similar. Also, if you're going to have overlaying imagery (circle, bolts, and hexagon) they should all be different colors.

I agree overall. The Empire's is more ambitious and its layout feels a bit more pleasing to my eye, but I can more easily imagine the Separatists' design on an actual flagpole. If the Separatists comprise five nations or noble houses with some kind of emperor-god leading their alliance, so much the better.

KS.

 It's simple, evocative, and memorable. Good use of color and space, and is recognizable at a distance.

Best,
-Slashy

2 minutes ago, GoSlash27 said:

KS.

 It's simple, evocative, and memorable. Good use of color and space, and is recognizable at a distance.

Best,
-Slashy

Well dang, everything I was going to say.

Except that it'd be weird if I started calling myself Slashy.

The AE flag, "flag-ified".

Simple use of colors and shapes, symbolizes the same thing, recognizable at a distance.

Best,
-Slashy
Not a fan of either, too much green on one to high contrast on the other

No one could decide in the end..

The population of KSC2 favored one.. While KSC prefered the other..

 

KSC is a ballistic missile base..

The last nuclear rocket was launched there

The great and numerous kerbal society is no more..where masses of green people once roamed.. There is only green grass

Sad

I voted the KS flag, but I also need to take a moment to thank @HebaruSan for posting that video.  It really got me thinking, so now I've gone and redesigned my own flag (as well as the mission patches for my space program, an example of which is my avatar).

@KSP Bros, please tell us that the actual flags used in-game don't have all those compression artifacts.  If the .png flag you're using in-game for the KS side is clean of them, then I think it'd actually look equally good on the pole or painted on the side of your rockets.

I have 4 flags... depending on the mission...
Exploration, Research, Logistics, Classified

Edited March 12, 2016 by luizopiloto

From the design point of view bright Green and Red colors are a bad combination, very hard on eyes. Can only be viable on Christmas. Flags don't like two shades of the same color. Green on green looks bad.

Edited March 12, 2016 by Enceos

1 hour ago, luizopiloto said:

I have 4 flags... depending on the mission...
Exploration, Research, Logistics, Classified

I stole your "Classified flag"   : D
These works of a fan have been moved to Fan Works.

On 3/11/2016 at 1:14 AM, Aetharan said:

I think it'd actually look equally good on the pole or painted on the side of your rockets.

This is AE, and the fact is all he has to do with rockets is getting into orbit. He hasn't landed on any clesential body yet, hasn't docked, so I rule space until he learns this. Yes, we are waging war. I on the other hand, has done all the above, landed on mun, minmus, duna, orbited laythe, jool, tylo, val, bop and pol. On our DMP server, I already set up a powerful base on the Mun. I am planning to go to other planets with permanent bases soon.

On 3/12/2016 at 5:13 PM, Vanamonde said:

These works of a fan have been moved to Fan Works. 

Ok. I didn't know this was supposed to go there.

The lightning bolts represent the power, and the planets on the sides represent our dominance of space. (its true, I have WAAAAY better space assets than him. I have been to 10 clesential bodies, he has been to 2 [kerbin &kerbol].)

I edited my flag. (AE) Might wanna vote again.

I voted the KS flag, but I also need to take a moment to thank @HebaruSan for posting that video.  It really got me thinking, so now I've gone and redesigned my own flag (as well as the mission patches for my space program, an example of which is my avatar).

@KSP Bros, please tell us that the actual flags used in-game don't have all those compression artifacts.  If the .png flag you're using in-game for the KS side is clean of them, then I think it'd actually look equally good on the pole or painted on the side of your rockets.

I edited my flag. (AE) Might wanna vote again.

On 3/11/2016 at 6:04 PM, GoSlash27 said:

The AE flag, "flag-ified".

Simple use of colors and shapes, symbolizes the same thing, recognizable at a distance.

Best,
-Slashy

I remade it. See it in my signature. I think this version is better. Honestly, I think yours is a bit complicated. If you watched @HebaruSan's video, an important factor is it being easy to memorize and draw. My new one is easy.

But thank you for taking the time & effort to make me a flag.

On 3/11/2016 at 4:45 PM, HebaruSan said:

I agree overall. The Empire's is more ambitious and its layout feels a bit more pleasing to my eye, but I can more easily imagine the Separatists' design on an actual flagpole. If the Separatists comprise five nations or noble houses with some kind of emperor-god leading their alliance, so much the better.

I remade my flag. Still pleasing to the eye, and now better.

'cause I can

Does your empire work for Target?

-KSP Bros KS
Mine is better on flagpole. Deal with it

Mi new one is better. Plus, Kerbals don't even have blood, represented by the red on your flag.
